name: Future Tactics: The Uprising
description:
Future Tactics: The Uprising is a strategy game developed by Warthog, Zed Two and Zed Two Game Design Studio. It came out on 10-05-2004. JoWooD Productions published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Future Tactics: The Uprising on Xbox, GameCube, PlayStation 2 and PC.
Tim Follin scored the game.
